sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' const About = () => { return (
This application is built to remove the drawback of the traditional Attendance System and to help the teachers to retrieve the efficient data from the studentâ€™s record.
This website starts from the Teacher Login window, If the teacher already registered then simply entered their registered Name, Email and Password, and if the teacher data does not exist previously then just Click at the New Registration button and Registered their self and then Loge through the Teacher Login form in to the class. After Logging in to the Class teacher can admit a student and also can take the attendance of the class. In the header ribbon there are two buttons with the name Record and Individual_Record, while clicked on the Record button teacher can see the whole result of attendance day by day and on clicked at the Individual_Record teacher can retrieve the data related to the specific student.
Note: If the teacher does not logged in the records couldn,t be shown.
) } export default About
